attributes.action: leave the law regarding cohabiting couples' legal rights unchanged.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Couples who live together but do not get married are doing so because they do not want the level of commitment that marriage offers. This is an entirely personal choice. 

Please leave unmarried couples to enjoy the freedom and benefits of being in a relationship but ultimately single.

If you want the benefits of commitment, get married!
